name: Ascent of Light
description:
Try to attain enlightenment, to rise from below to the summit of spiritual realities, the highest point of the self-realization.
Get the necessary score as soon as possible! As more lights as more score.

Controls:
A/D or Left/Right for moves
W/K/Up for jump
J/Space/Z for shoot

The game by Rubel
made for ludum dare 35
